column3: Traffic; Phnom Penh: BREAKING NEWS: At least five people have been seriously injured after an SCG cement truck crashed into traffic on Monivong.------The incident happened at 7:50 am on February 20
column5: in front of Boeung Trabek High School
column6: in Chamkar Mon district. Phnom Penh. The truck driver was arrested immediately.Â ------UPDATE: A later report stated that a high school teacher who was on his way into work was killed in the incident.------WARNING VERY GRAPHIC IMAGES FROM SCENE in------ source link
